Rule: SEGMENT_ID : unique identifier, 12 digits, combination of product type, age, original LTV, original industry standard credit score, geography, delinquency status
BHC_NAME : bank holding company name, text
RSSD_ID : RSSD ID number, numeric
REPORTING_MONTH : month of reporting, date format, fixed values: January to December
PORTFOLIO_ID : portfolio ID, text, fixed value: Auto
PRODUCT_TYPE : product type, text, fixed values: 01, 02, 03
AGE : age, numeric, fixed values: 01, 02, 03, 04, 05, 06
ORIGINAL_LTV : original LTV, numeric, fixed values: 01, 02, 03, 04
ORIGINAL_INDUSTRY_STANDARD_CREDIT_SCORE : original industry standard credit score, numeric, fixed values: 01, 02, 03, 04, 05, 06
GEOGRAPHY : geography, text, fixed values: 01, 02, 03, 04, 05, 06
DELINQUENCY_STATUS : delinquency status, text, fixed values: 01, 02, 03, 04, 05
Product type : categorical, values = 01, 02, 03, fixed values
Age : categorical, values = 01, 02, 03, 04, 05, 06, fixed values
Original LTV : categorical, values = 01, 02, 03, 04, fixed values
Original commercially available credit bureau score or equivalent : categorical, values = 00, 01, 02, 03, 04, 05, fixed values
Geography : categorical, values = 01, 02, 03, 04, 05, fixed values
Region : fixed values (Vermont, New Hampshire, Nebraska, South Dakota, North Dakota), categorical
Delinquency status : fixed values (01 - Current + 1-29 DPD, 02 - 30-59 DPD, 03 - 60-89 DPD, 04 - 90-119 DPD, 05 - 120+ DPD), categorical
Accounts : non-negative integer, total number of accounts
Outstandings : non-negative number, total unpaid principal balance
New accounts : non-negative integer, total number of new accounts
New accounts amount : non-negative number, total dollar amount of new accounts
Interest rate : non-negative number, average annual percentage rate
Vehicle type car/van : non-negative number, unpaid principal balance for car/van
Vehicle type SUV/truck : non-negative number, unpaid principal balance for SUV/truck
Vehicle type : categorical, values include Sport/Luxury/Convertible, Unknown
Repossession : non-negative numeric
Current Month Repossession : non-negative numeric
Gross contractual charge-offs : non-negative numeric
Bankruptcy charge-offs : non-negative numeric
Recoveries : numeric
Net charge-offs : numeric
Adjustment factor to reconcile gross contractual charge-offs to net charge-offs : numeric
Ever 30DPD in the last 12 months : non-negative, numeric, past due amount
Ever 60DPD in the last 12 months : non-negative, numeric, past due amount
Projected value : non-negative, numeric, applicable for leased vehicles
Actual sale proceeds : non-negative, numeric, applicable for leased vehicles
Original term <= 48 months : non-negative, numeric, term in months
Original term 49-60 months : non-negative, numeric, term in months
Original term 61-72 months : non-negative, numeric, term in months
Original term > 72 months : non-negative, numeric, term in months
Origination channel : direct, indirect
Loss mitigation : yes, no
Joint application : yes, no
Probability of Default (PD) : numeric, between 0 and 1
Loss Given Default (LGD) : numeric, between 0 and 1
ELGD : numeric, non-negative, less than or equal to 1, may be null, fixed values possible (e.g. 0.9 for ninety percent)
RWA : numeric, non-negative, may be null
Unpaid Principal Balance at Charge-off : numeric, non-negative, may be null
Percent Loss Severity (3 month Lagged) : numeric, non-negative, less than or equal to 1, may be null
Weighted Average Life of Loans : numeric, non-negative, may be null, rounded to nearest monthly term
